Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to the payment of arrears for certain taxes and placing limitations on housing development fund company regulatory agreements
Summary: Modifies certain eligibility requirements; extends the time period for the payment of arrears for certain taxes; places limitations on housing development fund company regulatory agreements.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to the payment of arrears for certain taxes and placing limitations on housing development fund company regulatory agreements
